column3: This cat watch is kinda crappy! It tells the time so you'd think that's great. But the cat glasses broke off in the first month. Still pretty cute tho.
Dare I say it? This is the BOMB.com!! #productpuns
This is garbage! It didn't even survive outside during the first rainstorm of the season.
Perfect ambiance for when I bring my dates back to my place. They even forget that we're in my mom's basement!
I take nightly baths and this is BY FAR the best bath bomb I'v used! It not only smells amazing but also leave my skin silky smooth. I only give it a three because that's my favorite number
THIS IS SO FUN! I brought it into my 1st grade class room and loved it! One thumb up! (I lost my other in a tire swing accident a few years back)
Super fun a festive! Great for a back-yard BBQ

column5: it only holds a normal bottle of wine - not a double - need a grown up elephant for that!

column3: I thought about getting a cardboard moose for my wall but the face is so much more relatable
